calculateAverage(Vector2d...) - Static method in class fast3d.math.Vector2d
the average vector is:
does not change the parameter
the center position (if the given vectors were interpreted as positions) the middle-direction (if the given vectors were interpreted as directions)

does not change the parameter

calculatePuncture(Vector3d, Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.math.geom.Plate
calculates the puncture point of the straight with this
the straight must not be parallel to this
calculatePunctureWithLine(Vector3d, Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.renderables.Rectangle
calculates the point that is on both this and the given line
the lines length is the length of its direction-vector
the given ray is mathematically restricted with the length-coefficient of the direction-vector in the interval [0.0d,1.0d]

calculateShadows - Variable in class fast3d.complex.light.ObstructableLight
determines whether to calculate all shadows caused by this light-source (may cause insane computational effort)
Callout - Class in fast3d.renderables
a callout is a 2d-text floating on a 3d-location, facing the camera, heading up
the callout uses a built-in font class

Callout.Text - Class in fast3d.renderables

cam - Variable in class fast3d.math.Shader
the camera used to render the scene from
Camera - Class in fast3d.math
each shader needs information about the camera-setting to shade from, to project all the vertices correctly to the screen
a camera has a position and an orientation (look-direction and up-direction) and a mode-setting
Camera() - Constructor for class fast3d.math.Camera
position=Vector3d.zero
lookDirection=Vector3d.forward
mode=CameraMode.normalPerspectiveMode();
CameraMode - Class in fast3d.math

collides(Renderable) - Method in class fast3d.complex.Group
if the parameter is not a group, every triangle of this will be checked for collision, this collides if any of its triangles collides
if the parameter is a group if this.collisionSphereRadius equals zero, an triangle-to-triangle-collision-detection will be done, this collides if any of its triangles collides to any of the parameters triangles if the collisionSphereRadius is greater than zero, this collides if the distance between this position-vector and the parameters position-vector is not greater than the collisionSphereRadius of this if the collisionSphereRadius is less than zero, this collides if the distance between this position-vector and the parameters position-vector is not greater than the collisionSphereRadius of the parameter
collides(Renderable) - Method in class fast3d.complex.Object
collides if any of its groups collides
collides(Renderable) - Method in class fast3d.complex.Scene
collides if any of its objects collides
collides(Rectangle) - Method in class fast3d.renderables.Rectangle
two rectangles collide if they are not the same one and one side of the parameter triangle has a puncture point with this
collides(Triangle) - Method in class fast3d.renderables.Triangle
two triangles collide if they are not the same one and one side of the parameter triangle has a puncture point with this
collisionSphereRadius - Variable in class fast3d.complex.Group
the radius used to determine whether another group is near enough to do collision-detection
Color - Class in fast3d.graphics
a color in 3d-space is represented by 4 values: r(red),g(green),b(blue) and alpha(transparency) in the rgba-model, but the values of r,g,b and alpha have to in the interval [0d,1d]
used for lighting and general coloring in a 3d-graphics-context
Color(double, double, double, double) - Constructor for class fast3d.graphics.Color
constructs a color-model, r,g,b and a in [0d,1d]
an alpha value of 1 means opaque and 0 means transparent
Color(double, double, double) - Constructor for class fast3d.graphics.Color
constructs a color-model, r,g and b in [0d,1d]
the alpha component will be 1d (opaque)
Color(Vector4d) - Constructor for class fast3d.graphics.Color
constructs a color-model, r,g,b,a as declared by x,y,z,a in the given vector3d
color - Variable in class fast3d.renderables.Callout.Text
a field to store the color of the text

computeDistance(Point, Point) - Static method in class fast3d.util.math.RelationshipAnalytics
for two non-IDENTICAL points their distance between them is greater than 0, otherwise 0
computeDistance(Straight, Point) - Static method in class fast3d.util.math.RelationshipAnalytics
for a point non-INCIDENT to the straight the distance between the point and the straight is greater than 0 otherwise 0
the distance between a point and a straight is the distance between the point and its nadir point on the straight
computeDistance(Plate, Point) - Static method in class fast3d.util.math.RelationshipAnalytics
for a point non-INCIDENT to the plate the distance between the point and the plate is greater than 0 otherwise 0
the distance between a point and a plate is the distance between the point and its nadir point on the plate
computeDistance(Plate, Straight) - Static method in class fast3d.util.math.RelationshipAnalytics
for a straight PARALLEL to the plate the distance between the straight and the plate is greater than 0 otherwise 0
the distance between a straight and a plate is the distance between the nadir point of any point on the straight to the plate
computeDistance(Plate, Plate) - Static method in class fast3d.util.math.RelationshipAnalytics
for a plate PARALLEL to the other plate the distance between the plates is greater than 0 otherwise 0
the distance between two plates is the distance between the nadir point of any point on the first plate to the other plate
computeDistance(Straight, Straight, Relationship) - Static method in class fast3d.util.math.RelationshipAnalytics
if the straights are PARALLEL: their distance is defined as the distance from any point on one of the straights to the other straight
if the straights are ASKEW: their distance is the minimum distance between a pair of two points (one on the first straight and one on the other)
in any other case the distance between the straights is undefined (result -1);
computeDistance(Straight, Straight, double) - Static method in class fast3d.util.math.RelationshipAnalytics
a wrapper to computeDistance(Straight,Straight,Relationship)
first their relationship is computed then this method calls the wrapped method
computeDistance(Straight, Straight) - Static method in class fast3d.util.math.RelationshipAnalytics
a wrapper to computeDistance(Straight,Straight,double) with zeroLockControl disabled
first their relationship is computed then this method calls the wrapped method
computeIntersection(Straight, Straight) - Static method in class fast3d.util.math.RelationshipAnalytics
for INTERSECTING straights this method computes the point that is on both straights
computeIntersection(Plate, Straight) - Static method in class fast3d.util.math.RelationshipAnalytics
for a straight INTERSECTING the plate this method computes the point that is on both the straight and the plate
computeIntersection(Plate, Plate, double) - Static method in class fast3d.util.math.RelationshipAnalytics
for INTERSECTING plates this method computes the straight that is INCIDENT for both plates
computeIntersection(Plate, Plate) - Static method in class fast3d.util.math.RelationshipAnalytics
a wrapper to computeIntersection(Plate,Plate,double) with zeroLockControl disabled
Cone - Class in fast3d.simple.shapes

constrain() - Method in class fast3d.graphics.Color
constrains all parts automatically to the correct interval of [0d,1d]
constrain(double, double) - Method in class fast3d.math.Vector2d
constrains the coordinates to the given range
if a coordinate is lower than min, it will be set to min
if a coordinate is higher than max, it will be set to max
after this method call all coordinates will be within the interval [min,max], including the limits
constrain(double, double) - Method in class fast3d.math.Vector3d
constrains the coordinates to the given range
if a coordinate is lower than min, it will be set to min
if a coordinate is higher than max, it will be set to max
after this method call all coordinates will be within the interval [min,max], including the limits
constrain(double, double) - Method in class fast3d.math.Vector4d
constrains the coordinates to the given range
if a coordinate is lower than min, it will be set to min
if a coordinate is higher than max, it will be set to max
after this method call all coordinates will be within the interval [min,max], including the limits
constrain(double, double, double) - Static method in class fast3d.util.math.MathUtil
if the value is within the interval [min,max] it will be returned with no difference
if the value is lower than min, min is returned
if the value is higher than max, max is returned
constrainLength(double, double) - Method in class fast3d.math.Vector2d
constrains the length to the given range
if this length is lower than min, it will be scaled to min
if this length is higher than max, it will be scaled to max
constrainLength(double, double) - Method in class fast3d.math.Vector3d
constrains the length to the given range
if this length is lower than min, it will be scaled to min
if this length is higher than max, it will be scaled to max
constrainLength(double, double) - Method in class fast3d.math.Vector4d
constrains the length to the given range
if this length is lower than min, it will be scaled to min
if this length is higher than max, it will be scaled to max

Control - Class in fast3d.control
offers the possibility to react on user input
a control implements all AWT-event-listeners which can be (un)bound using activate() or deactivate()
a panel3d should call on preRender() the performInput() method
subclasses have to implement performInput() to do what they intend to change on the panel3d
subclasses should call activate(boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean) in onActivate() to let the control register the desired listeners - same procedure in onDeactivate()
subclasses can easily override the AWT-event-methods to save the user action until performInput is called
it is highly recommended do only do changes on the panel3d in performInput()
the backing Panel3d can be accessed by the protected field p3d
Control(Panel3d) - Constructor for class fast3d.control.Control
creates a new (not yet activated) control on the panel3d
convert(File, boolean) - Static method in class fast3d.util.serial.F3ObjExporter
converts the given *.obj-file to an equal *.f3obj-file
CORNFLOWER_BLUE() - Static method in class fast3d.util.ColorGen

crossP(Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.math.Vector3d
the cross-product of two vectors is a vector that is orthogonal to the parameters
it does matter in which order the parameters are given.
crossP(Vector3d, Vector3d) - Static method in class fast3d.math.Vector3d
the cross-product of two vectors is a vector that is orthogonal to the parameters
it does matter in which order the parameters are given.
